title: How to Make DIY Office Weapons

steps.headline: You are going to need.
steps.description:
Seven pencils
A bunch of rubber bands
A plastic spoon
A binder clip

steps.headline: Attach three of the pencils so that it forms a square with a hole at the top.
Attach the last pencil with the binder clip going through it.
Attach two more pencils at the rear in a slight triangular shape.
steps.description: This is a base to keep it from flinging forward when you shoot.

steps.headline: Attach the spoon to the final pencil with rubber bands or tape and put it in the clip with a little piece of pencil sticking out.
Attach many rubber bands to the end of the clip to the pencils in front.
And there we go.
steps.description: A catapult. You can shoot coins, paper, and marbles but also many other things.

steps.headline: Carefully remove the bottom of the party popper and remove all of the insides.
steps.description: This can be done by adding pressure on the sides of the popper.

steps.headline: Now unscrew the bottom and the top so that there is only the body of the pen left.
Thread the string of the party popper through the part which you write from.
Re screw the pen tip on the body.
Add your ammunition in the body of the pen and pull the string.

text:
Making a Catapult You are going to need. Seven pencils
A bunch of rubber bands
A plastic spoon
A binder clip Attach three of the pencils so that it forms a square with a hole at the top.  Attach the last pencil with the binder clip going through it.  Attach two more pencils at the rear in a slight triangular shape. This is a base to keep it from flinging forward when you shoot. Attach the spoon to the final pencil with rubber bands or tape and put it in the clip with a little piece of pencil sticking out.  Attach many rubber bands to the end of the clip to the pencils in front.  And there we go. A catapult. You can shoot coins, paper, and marbles but also many other things. Party Popper Cannon You will need A party popper A pen Carefully remove the bottom of the party popper and remove all of the insides. This can be done by adding pressure on the sides of the popper. Now unscrew the bottom and the top so that there is only the body of the pen left.  Thread the string of the party popper through the part which you write from.  Re screw the pen tip on the body.  Add your ammunition in the body of the pen and pull the string.
